string.name: str_strategy_pattern
string.b:
1. What varies should be encapsulate. 
     Varying code ----- stay same code. 

 2. Code to interface/supertype, 
     not to implementation. 

 3. Favour composition over inheritance.

string.name: str_template_pattern
string.b:
1. The abstract class will define sets of methods 
     as template. 

 2. The subclass will execute the methods, 
     they way are defined in super class.

string.name: str_observer_pattern
string.b:
1. It follow one-to many concept. 
     When a state of object is changed, notified to 
     all its dependents. 

 2. Its loosely coupled software design patterns 
       between objects.

string.name: str_sing_pattern
string.b:
1. This design pattern is useful to have only one 
     object of a class. 

 2. It strict class to have only one object, saves 
     memory.

string.name: str_builder_pattern
string.b:
1. When a class have to many properties, 
     it is very messy to have to many constructor or 
    setters. 

 2. Builder pattern helps in avoiding creation of 
     constructor as parameters grows. 

 3. Flexible to add new property in class.
